```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)

FAS_pups <- 
  read_csv("../data/FAS_pups.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  gather(key = "pd", value = "value", pd_ears:pd_walk) %>%
  separate(pd, into = c("remove", "pd"), sep = "_") %>% 
  select(-remove)


```
